title: Pan-fried chicken breasts with plum salsa and basmati rice
ingredients: ['350ml water', '180g basmati rice, rinsed and drained', '350g plums, stones removed and chopped', '1/2 medium red onion, minced', '3 habanero or Scotch bonnet chillies, seeded and minced', '3 tablespoons minced fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon sugar', '350g boneless, skinless chicken breast fillets', '2 teaspoons fresh rosemary, minced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil']
